alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Inland Bay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Bay and southwestern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 400 PM EDT/300 PM CDT/... At 315 PM EDT/215 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles northeast of Lynn Haven, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Nixon, Bennett, Youngstown, Cairo, Frink, Kinard, Singer Road, Broad Branch, Saunders, Majette and Camp Flowers. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
